Uri.description: Uri used to download the wordlist

Hash.description: SHA256 hash of the wordlist file

Enforced.description: Determines enforcement status of the wordlist. if it's true, it will block any operations if the word is found in the wordlist, but if set to false, it just shows a warning

InstallDirectory.description: The installation directory of the wordlist compiled files

Words.description: The number of words included in the wordlist

Size.description: The size of the wordlist file
